Alarm.Documentation: // An object representing a CloudWatch alarm associated with a scaling policy.

AlarmARN.Documentation: // The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alarm.

PolicyName.Documentation: // The name of the scaling policy to delete.

Ref.Documentation: // The name of the scaling policy to delete.
// The name of the scaling policy to delete.

ScalableTargets.Documentation: // The list of scalable targets that matches the request parameters.

ScalingActivities.Documentation: // A list of scaling activity objects.

PolicyNames.Documentation: // The names of the scaling policies to describe.

ScalingPolicies.Documentation: // A list of scaling policy objects.

PolicyName.Documentation: // The name of the scaling policy.

PolicyType.Documentation: // The policy type. This parameter is required if you are creating a new policy.

Ref.Documentation: // The name of the scaling policy.
// The name of the scaling policy.

PolicyARN.Documentation: // The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resulting scaling policy.

ScalableTarget.Documentation: // An object representing a scalable target.

CreationTime.Documentation: // The Unix timestamp for when the scalable target was created.

MaxCapacity.Documentation:
// The maximum value for this scalable target to scale out to in response to
// scaling activities.

MinCapacity.Documentation:
// The minimum value for this scalable target to scale in to in response to
// scaling activities.

RoleARN.Documentation:
// The ARN of the IAM role that allows Application Auto Scaling to modify your
// scalable target on your behalf.

ScalingActivity.Documentation: // An object representing a scaling activity.

ActivityId.Documentation: // The unique identifier string for the scaling activity.

Cause.Documentation: // A simple description of what caused the scaling activity to happen.

Description.Documentation: // A simple description of what action the scaling activity intends to accomplish.

Details.Documentation: // The details about the scaling activity.

EndTime.Documentation: // The Unix timestamp for when the scaling activity ended.

StartTime.Documentation: // The Unix timestamp for when the scaling activity began.

StatusCode.Documentation: // Indicates the status of the scaling activity.

StatusMessage.Documentation: // A simple message about the current status of the scaling activity.

ScalingPolicy.Documentation: // An object representing a scaling policy.

Alarms.Documentation: // The CloudWatch alarms that are associated with the scaling policy.

CreationTime.Documentation: // The Unix timestamp for when the scaling policy was created.

PolicyARN.Documentation: // The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the scaling policy.

PolicyName.Documentation: // The name of the scaling policy.

StepScalingPolicyConfiguration.Documentation: // The configuration for the step scaling policy.
// An object representing a step scaling policy configuration.

AdjustmentType.Documentation:
// The adjustment type, which specifies how the ScalingAdjustment parameter
// in a StepAdjustment is interpreted.

MetricAggregationType.Documentation:
// The aggregation type for the CloudWatch metrics. Valid values are Minimum,
// Maximum, and Average.

StepAdjustments.Documentation:
// A set of adjustments that enable you to scale based on the size of the alarm
// breach.

Ref.Documentation:
// A set of adjustments that enable you to scale based on the size of the alarm
// breach.
